item1.title: Director-General of National Data Protection Authority Meets with Minister of Ports to Discuss Collaboration
item1.summary: This morning, Mr. Mohamed Nur Ali Olow visited Mogadishu Port and met with the Minister of Ports.

item2.title: The Prime Minister of Somalia, H.E. Hamza Abdi Barre.
item2.summary: Mr. Hamza Abdi Barre laid the foundation stone for the new DPA building.

item3.title: The Deputy General Manager of the Data Protection Authority.
item3.summary: Mr. Daa'uud Cabdi Xuseen participated in NADPA's Annual Conference in Nairobi.

item4.title: The DPA hosts Mr. Mohamed Mahmoud Ali
item4.summary: DPA was honored to host former Auditor General Mr. Maxamed Maxamuud Cali “Afgooye”.

item5.title: Deputy Director Launches Capacity-Building Training
item5.summary: Mr. Da’ud Shigaye inaugurated training to enhance staff skills.
